name: Flourish Density Booster for Healthy Hair Growth
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Scalp Treatments
about: What it is: A potent, botanical-based nutrient infusion for the scalp that fuels fatigued follicles and nurtures new, fragile hairs so they thicken and thrive...Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Thinning.- Antiaging.- Volumizing..Key Benefits:.- Stimulates the hair follicle.- Strengthens new and existing strands.- Thickens each strand..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICAL Protein: A protein duo that encourages growth with microbiome-balancing ingredients..- Biomimetic Signal Peptides: Nourish and calm the scalp to help create a healthy environment for growth..- Larch Wood Extract: Encourages the initiation of the anagen growth phase...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: A drug-free spray with ingredients that are clinically known to support hair regrowth, balance the microbiome, and nourish hair and scalp. Itu2019s made for those experiencing thinning and loss due to temporary factors like postpartum, stress, or diet. See results in as few as four weeks when used as part of the Flourish regimen...Fragrance Description: A gentle, spa-like blend of aromatic herbs, bright citrus, clean flowers, and balancing woods, with basil and patchouli essential oils for scalp care and healthy hair...Clinical Results: In an independent, third-party test of 35 women, when the booster was used in combination with the Flourish Shampoo and Conditioner as part of a regimen, women saw the following results after 6 months of use:.- 97% saw healthier hair growth after 3 months.- 91% saw less fall out.- 94% said Flourish is more effective than other hair growth solutions they've tried
ingredients: -Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICAL Protein: A protein duo that encourages growth with microbiome-balancing ingredients. .-Biomimetic Signal Peptides: Nourish and calm the scalp to help create a healthy environment for growth. .-Larch Wood Extract: Encourages the initiation of the anagen growth phase. ..Aqua (Water, Eau), Keratin, Methyl Nicotinate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Nasturtium Officinale Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Hydrolyzed Hibiscus Esculentus Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Tocopherol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Dextran, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Quaternium-51, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Glycine, Parfum (Fragrance), Biosaccharide Gum-4, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Zinc Chloride, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Propanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, t-Butyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Hexyl Cinnamal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Lift damp or dry hair into sections..-Spray directly onto scalp..-Gently massage in..-Do not rinse.-Use once daily..-Tip: The scalp is typically most receptive to nighttime treatment, when the body is at rest and the ingredients can be fully absorbed and processed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hairdresser mentioned it made my hair thicker, but I personally couldnu2019t get over how it made my hairline look like I had a red rash after application. Brand customer service explained this was due to Methyl Nicotinate, a vasodilator used in personal care products as a penetration enhancer for u201cactiveu201d ingredients. This reaction was only temporary and not painful, but it irked me to look atu2026 For that reason, I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_text: Haircare and nourishment is very important for healthy , shiny hair! I was facing concerns regarding hair thinning and hairfall. There was considerable reduction in hairfall and my hair looked voluminous and healthier (like an instant lift). I noticed healthy new growth which is amazing considering I am in my late thirties! I love how voluminous my hair looks! The fragrance is beautiful with amazing scent notes of citrus,  flowers , woods & basil! Its smells like you just walked into an amazing spa! Definitely recommend for hairfall and hair thinning concerns!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Virtue Flourish Density Booster is a game-changing treatment for anyone struggling with thinning hair or wanting to boost their hairu2019s overall density. Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks, and the results are already impressive. My hair looks and feels fuller, and Iu2019ve noticed less shedding, which is such a relief!  The formula is lightweight and easy to applyu2014it doesnu2019t leave any sticky residue or weigh my hair down. I spray it directly onto my scalp after washing and gently massage it in. It absorbs quickly, and I can style my hair as usual without any buildup.  One of the standout features is its Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICAL. Itu2019s specifically formulated to nourish the scalp and encourage new hair growth while strengthening existing strands. Over time, I can see how this product is helping improve both the quality and thickness of my hair.  The subtle scent is fresh and clean, which I really appreciateu2014itu2019s not overpowering like some other hair treatments.  Yes, itu2019s a premium product, but for the noticeable difference in hair density and health, itu2019s 100% worth the investment. If youu2019re looking for an effective, science-backed solution to thinning hair, I highly recommend giving Virtue Flourish Density Booster a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product consistently for four months but unfortunately have not seen any improvement or hair growth in the area that I've been applying the product to.  Since I was applying it to small area, I still have about 1/4 of the bottle left and will continue to use until the end.  To answer some of the questions I've seen, yes this product does cause the area to become red but does go away after about 30 mins.  I did not experience any burning or itching.  There is a very strong smell when the product is applied, but after the first month or so, I think I got used to the smell and it was not as overwhelming as when I first started using it.  I noticed that the cap on the product does not stay on properly so I suggest you do not pick it up by the cap or the bottle will fall and potentially break.  On a couple of occasions, the spray would stick which would cause the product to not spray on the correct area of my scalp but other than that I had not issue with how the product sprayed from the bottle.

reviews.review_title: Try Virtue you wonu2019t be disappointed ud83dude01ud83dudc4d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Virtue products and this Flourish Density Booster is no exception. Since using this product I have noticed a difference in my hair growth. Itu2019s healthy too.

I had high hopes for this product but I am one of the many, it seems, that just can't get past the smell. I have been using this for three days now and, on each of those days, the scent is literally the first thing I smell when I wake up in the morning, having applied it the nights before as directed. The scent is SO strong. I was willing to put up with the strong fragrance, if it worked, until my husband of almost 25 years finally said to me this morning, I really hope this doesn't hurt your feelings but I kind of don't like the smell of your new 'shampoo'... He would NEVER say such a thing unless the scent was truly bothering him. Some reviews say they like the scent and I guess it's a case of to each their own. To me, the scent is so unbearably strong that this product is a big NO for me, however well it might have worked. If you are at all sensitive to strong smells, consider looking elsewhere...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had fine hair and envied those with thick hair. A few months ago I made the huge mistake of starting to use minoxidil when I noticed my hair was slightly thinning at my temples. Not understanding how it worked, I started putting it all over the top & front of my scalp, hoping for eventual thicker growth. I can't tell you how much I regret it. My part line is so thin now that I can't wear my hair up without putting in a bunch of hairspray to hide it.  After that disaster I looked around for something without minoxidil to help reverse what I'd done, and found this. I love that it has nicotinate to increase blood flow & absorption, and it was on sale so I bought a few bottles. It IS working. I've been using it a few weeks now every night before bed, and I can 100% tell I have significantly less hair fall. I barely have anything in the brush or drain after brushing/showering as opposed to hair being everywhere. I know it's going to take probably a year before I can really tell that my hair is denser, which just goes with the territory. If you try this, be prepared to give it a fair shot. You can't watch hair grow. I will keep stocking up when on sale, but honestly if it's working it's worth the full $50 to me. A woman's hair is a precious thing! This is the current state of my hair. Hopefully in a few months I can edit this review & add an updated photo.   PS- I can't emphasize enough to really consider the consequences of using minoxidil as a woman, do research and seriously talk to your Dr first. Men's hair is short and takes no time to regrow after falling out. Long hair is another story.

reviews.review_title: Surprise substitute for dry shampoo for thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product myself from Sephora - I was not gifted it by the brand in exchange for reviews. I have very fine, thin, color treated hair (shoulder length).  I do not have bald patches on my scalp, but my hair tends to break or fall out before reaching any material length.  I hoped that pattern would stop after more time post-partum, but that baby is now 6 so I'm thinking not.  My hair usually looks fine right after washing, but day 2 hair is a struggle.  It's flat, greasy, and looks very stringy and sparse at the ends. This product works better than any dry shampoo (and I've tried MANY) on fixing day 2 hair.  I dampen my hair, apply at the roots as directed, and do a quick blow dry with a round brush and I swear it looks like I just washed and dried my hair.  I have not used this product long enough to speak to any long term growth support, but when I blowout after using this spray, there is very little hair in my brush, which is a big change from what I typically experience when styling.  I will absolutely continue to use this product in hopes the reduced shedding pays off over time.  My docked star is on account of the fragrance.  It is herbal and pleasant, but very strong.  After blowing out, it dissipates a bit but can definitely overpower a perfume or other fragrance you're wearing, especially if you just spray it on your hair with no subsequent brushing or styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Virtue Labs in order to review it. I have really long hair but itu2019s fine so this product appealed to me. I was only able to use this for 2 weeks before giving my review which isnu2019t enough time for me to really speak on new growth, but these are my thoughts so far. My hair seems like it has a little more volume around the roots. At first I didnu2019t like the smell but itu2019s grown on me. Itu2019s not a bad smell, itu2019s kind of almost a medicinal mixed with salon scent. It gives a nice cooling sensation on the scalp. I was worried this would make my hair crunchy or greasy but when I use it while my hair is wet you canu2019t tell I had put anything in it. When I use it on dry hair it gives a tiny bit of crunch but when you run your fingers through it goes away. One other thing to keep in mind is that it takes a good bit of sprays for me to cover my whole scalp, Iu2019ve used about a 5th of the bottle so far so Iu2019m not sure how long this would last although I could get away with using less if I was better about parting the hair to get to the scalp. If you have thin or thinning hair I think this is worth a shot.

reviews.review_text: Virtue Flourish Density Booster has a waterlike texture that makes it easy to spray onto the thinning parts of my scalp. I use this primarily at night because it takes time to dry down and not look so wet and waxy. So far I would say the pros are that itu2019s got definite clinical studies, itu2019s a fine spray, itu2019s lightweight, and easy to apply. The cons are that itu2019s slightly fragrant so if youu2019re applying a lot it can be overpowering. Another con is I wish the usage directions were clearer / there was more consumer education. For example, sometimes I shower at night and my hair is so fine that the next morning is usually the one day my hair looks nice before it goes oily. After I shower I am really hesitant to spray this in my hair so itu2019s hard to use consistently. I am wondering if Virtue recommends spraying it on clean hair and thatu2019s just the price we pay for getting that hair regrowth we want. Anyway, Iu2019ve only used this for a few weeks but Iu2019m dead set on using it for the 8-12 weeks they use in the clinicals that show results.  Gifted by Virtue Labs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Weird review, but I wanted to provide info that may be helpful for new users.  This is directly from the product page on Virtue's website:  The Density Booster incorporates Methyl Nicotinate, a vasodilator that works synergistically with the follicle supporting complex in the formula for optimal efficacy. As a result, you may notice a blushing or tingling of the scalp where the product is applied.  As with all products, we recommend that before using, conduct a patch test. Apply a small amount of product to the inside of the arm for a minimum of 15 minutes. If you experience flushing or tingling or any reaction, begin by targeting application only to those areas with hair loss, thinning or shedding. It is common to build a tolerance to this ingredient with continued use over time.  I've been using this product for about a week and half and have experienced this result - I don't find it itchy or painful, but red and raised and definitely a certain heat/tingling.  Goes away after about twenty minutes.  Since the company acknowledges this effect, I feel confident to continue using this product.  I'm not sure why this disclaimer was not posted on Sephora's product page (it's also missing from Amazon's product page), as it feels like pretty crucial information.  I haven't used this product long enough to comment on the effectiveness, but since I'm posting this review, I will come back and edit in a month or so and provide an update on how well it works re: hair growth/thickening/volume.  I do find application (aside from the initial redness) to be excellent - no stickiness, and once dried, the hair root looks good, far less stringy than Vegamour, IMHO.  Smell doesn't bother me at all, I like an herbal bouquet, but it also doesn't last once dried.  For reference, I have very long, thinnish, straightish, fine hair.  I've started this regimen with hopes of preventing hair thinning/loss due to aging.

reviews.review_text: I am on my 3rd bottle of this, using it nightly. It absolutely works. My hair is fine and thinning, but most noticeable has been the loss of hair at both temples and forehead. After 3 months, all these areas are growing in. The solution has not been too heavy or greasy for me, but I only spray on the scalp, not the entire strand of hair. Also, I massage it in for 10-20 min every night using a scalp massager. Iu2019ve used many, many hair growth products, several which Iu2019ve liked over the years, but none continue to work. Hopefully this one will. Please try it, and as with all hair growth products, be patient.

Not sure if this is typical (the bottle suggests applying at night when your body is at rest), but Iu2019ve really noticed a difference in how much shinier and smoother my hair is since i started using it.
